content:
We share an invitation to the demonstration.

<The image of this location is in the list above, but in order to protect the site's traffic costs, it cannot be displayed here, sorry.>

Invite Finnish. Photo: Finnish Palestinian Mediate Association

The demonstration is organized by the Finnish Palestinian Mediate Association. The invitation to the demonstration is:

We will all invite you to participate in the Gaza support demonstration on Saturday 24.2.2024 at 3:30 pm.

First we gather at the Railway Market and marched in front of the Israeli embassy.

Everything is warmly welcome.

Demonstration Facebook event: https://www.facebook.com/events/709049574647369

<The image of this location is in the list above, but in order to protect the site's traffic costs, it cannot be displayed here, sorry.>

Invite English. Photo: Finnish Palestinian Mediate Association

<The image of this location is in the list above, but in order to protect the site's traffic costs, it cannot be displayed here, sorry.>

title: Hki: Call of demonstration: Gaza in our heart and Rafah in our minds
author: lipunkantaja
